attributes.action: Change so the public can call a vote of no confidence in the current government
attributes.additional_details:
We the general working class are being forced into the worst living conditions in a day and age where people shouldn’t be having to survive from food bank handouts! 
Mental health and suicides are spiralling due to worry about rising bills and cost of everyday living, and yet the current government insults us with meaningless handouts that ultimately help nobody in the long run but are supposed to look like they are, WE the people are not idiots so stop treating us like you think we are!!
attributes.background:
We live in a country run by the wealthy, they don’t know what it means to struggle daily and therefore have no idea how to connect to the people they are supposed to represent! 
If you was not doing your job correctly you would be fired and this is what the petition basically points out

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
